data.text: @Local12 I had covid real bad abd I've been having a lot of bad memory but I also have real bad ADD so I can't tell whats what heh
@Local12 multiple times and got the same results then release this information until then quit spreading fear..

@Local12 Explain how Covid can cause Alzheimer's and Dementia. Covid attacked the lungs 🫁 and Respiratory. Which in some cases turned into Pneumonia.. Now if you mentioned those who received the vaccine this could be a possibility.. but until you have straight facts and it's been tested
@Local12 Alzheimer's and dementia is nothing to joke about at no point  just like diabetes and cancer

@Local12 Again, more single doc theories that have not been peer reviewed. This is nothing but panic mongering until the work he has done is reviewed by multiple experts. This is not proof of anything
